text: Pampa Grande Airport is an airport serving the town of Cajabamba, in the Cajamarca Region of Peru. The runway is west of the town. ==See also== * * *Transport in Peru *List of airports in Peru ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Pampa Grande *OurAirports - Cajabamba Category:Airports in Peru Category:Buildings and structures in Cajamarca Region
title: Pampa Grande Airport
